import React, {useEffect, useState} from "react"; import categoryService from "../services/categoryService"; import {Link, useParams} from "react-router-dom"; import {Image} from "react-bootstrap"; const Category = (props) => { const { category } = useParams(); const [items, setItems] = useState([]); const [categoryProduct, setCategoryProduct] = useState([]); const [page, setPage] = useState(1); const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1); const [totalPages, setTotalPages] = useState(0); const [id, setId] = useState(""); const [title, setTitle] = useState(""); const [price, setPrice] = useState(""); useEffect(() => { categoryService.list(category,page,id,title,price).then((res) => { setItems(res.items_prd.data); setCategoryProduct(res.data); setTotalPages(res.items_prd.last_page); setCurrentPage(res.items_prd.current_page); }); }, [category,page,id,title,price]); function handlePageChange(newPage) { setPage(newPage); } function Pagination({ totalPages, currentPage, onPageChange }) { const pages = []; for (let i = 1; i <= totalPages; i++) { pages.push(
  • onPageChange(i)}> {i}

    o - Mt trong nhng item thi trang khng th thiu trong t ca hu ht tt c cc c gi, d nng ang tui no hay theo ui phong cch g i chng na. Vy nn, trong nhng b su tp thi trang ca K&K Fashion cc NTK lun cp nht tht a dng cc mu m, mu sc, kiu dng nng c th d dng mix match vi nhiu mn khc nhau. Sn phm o ca K&K Fashion c th t tin p ng mi tiu ch ca nng t mu m n cht lng v c gi thnh phi chng, v cng hp l.

    - o s mi: Kiu dng thanh lch v nh nhn v cng thch hp i lm, i hc, khng ch th vi mt chic o s mi n basic nng c li c th kt hp cng nhiu loi trang phc khc nhau nh: qun, chn vy, hay khoc ngoi Hp thi trang v khng bao gi li mt chnh l nhng u im miu t kiu o s mi huyn thoi i cng nm thng ny. Kiu s mi n Hn Quc vi gam mu nh nhng, thanh lch lun c ch em yu thch nht, bn cnh , s mi ha tit n tng v ni bt lun gip nng bt trn mi nh nhn. Khi chn o s mi hy quan tm n vic phi hp mu sc, ha tit i lp gia phn trn v phn chn vy hoc qun set lun tht c sc.

    - o kiu: Nhm chn vi o s mi n n iu, nng c th chn cho mnh nhng chic o kiu p nh: o blouse, o babydoll, o kiu hn quc, o st nch, o kiu cng s ... thng hng phong cch chc chn s khng b qua nhng chic o kiu n ni bt vi cc thit k c l, ph cch thu ht mi nh nhn xung quanh.

    - o cropTop: Nhc n cc mu kiu o p c v vn cc c gi yu mn, th tht thiu st nu b qua croptop mu o ngn mt m, nng ng m v cng n tnh, khoe c cc ng cong mm mi ca c th.

    - o peplum: Mt thit k o kiu cng s p hack dng cho nng, d nng bo hay nng gy, vi item ny nng no din ln cng xinh ngt. Thit k che khuyt im bng m eo to l im nhn gip kiu o peplum lun ghi im v lun c sn n sut nhiu nm qua.

    - o thun: Mt trong nhng must have item, vi cht liu thong mt, thoi mi, d dng phi vi nhiu phong cch a dng khc nhau, li c th ng dng c trong nhiu trng hp nh: i lm, i chi m vn mang li cm gic thoi mi cho ngi din,y l mt trong v vn l do v sao mi c nng u s hu t nht mt chic o thun cho ring bn thn mnh.

    mi ma thi trang, o s mi, o kiu cng s... ti K&K Fashion li c update, ci tin v kiu dng, cht liu, mu sc v ha tit ph hp hn vi nhu cu phi i lm, i chi v mc p ca cc qu c.

    ng ng mnh trong nhng b trang phc cng nhc v nhm chn ca qu kh. Cng tr ti phi tht thi trang v phong cch vi nhng mu o mi t K&K Fashion nng nh!
